title: How to calculate inventory usage - Quora

response.answer_text: How to Calculate Inventory Usage Step 1: Take a 'Beginning-of-Period' Inventory. The first step for calculating inventory usage is recording your starting inventory for every item at the bar. ...Step 2: Add Any Received Product Orders During the Time Period. Next, we add in any received product inventory. ...Step 3: Subtract Your 'End-of-Period' Inventory.Inventory Usage = Starting Inventory + Received Product Orders – Ending Inventory
